Subject: Re: Cyclonus and Scourge

They both walk in and head down the hallway into the bridge of the ship,
when they arrive both of them drop their jaw, (Or in Wildriders case, his
eyes open wide, as he dosent have a jaw anymore) at the site of Cylconus,
Scourge, and Freakus. "Man oh man oh man, am I seeing ghosts?" asks
Speedbreaker.
